marEvi:
Spirit Box 
Ghost Orbs 
Ghost Writing
marTra:
The Mare will never turn on any lights. It has a chance to immediately flicker lights off and giving you EMF Level 2. 
 
The Mare prefers to do the ghost event that breaks the lights. 
 
If the lights around the Mare are on, the Mare will roam further.

Can Hunt at 60% Sanity when no lights are on, 40% whith lights are on.
marAbi: The Mare has no hidden abilities.
